xldoc.title: The Stack of Change
xldoc.description: A stack shaped catalogue of areas of RBJones.com which are under development

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: This is a "stack" of work in progress on this website.

subsec.p: This is an experiment to help me keep track of what I am working on (or perhaps more the ones I'm not actually working on but have left in mid flow to follow some other hare).

I expect it to be a stack only in the loosest sense. Which is, that the stuff at the top is what I'm working on. The stuff later I was working on before that, and the further down you go the more distant the prospect that I will ever get back to it.

sbcol.subsec: I generally have so many pages in an incomplete state (most of them!) that I loose track of pages before I ever finish them. Maybe this page will help me to get things nearer to completion.

secref.title: Metaphysics
secref.abstract: Metaphysics has come back to the top of the stack for two reasons. Firstly this move was provoked by my being referred to Algebraic Geometry by Rob Arthan as a better way of approaching differential geometry and more generally the matheamtics of physics. (my main problem with the kind of metaphysics I am interested is in the mathematica; prerequisites for a formal analysis of the issues).

sbcol.subsec: There are two main objectives here. The first is to articulate a positivistic conception of metaphysics. The second is to progress certain aspects of that. The three specific aspects to progress are abstract ontology, space-time and concrete ontology.
Before I started trying to integrate the romantic side of philosophy, my main preoccupation was to put forward a sceptical or positivistic philosophical stance.
